TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Parallax - PBR Terrain and Surface Objects [2.0.7]

Articles.Content:
Hi I was wondering whether parallax 2.0 would work with JNSQ 

Thanks fo all you do linx

Hi, guys 

I am having a problem with parallax when I get close to any planet except kerbin, the game freezes for a brief 5 to 8 seconds and then I will have entered the atmosphere of the new planet, it sometimes even lags the entire game but I can still access the settings menu while frozen in transfer window.

I have a 3060 12gb vram

11900k Intel cpu

16gb ram

I have all the parallex dependencies, Idk what to do with the mod because I have deleted it and so the game running fine, without it so it is the problem Plus I have more mods but they are all compatible with each other If anyone could help sheed some light on it would be greatly appreciated.

Hello, i was wondering What does tesselation do?

Hello, I've run into the following problem and was hoping to get some help here. Issue started when I installed Kcalbeloh on top of other mods. What happens is the game loads everything but then gets stuck in the loading screen just before the menu (with the kerbol system in the bottom right that says loading).
After a few good hours of trial and error I narrowed it down to some interactions between Parallax (2.0.6), Galaxies Unbound (1.3) and Kcalbeloh (v.10.3-alpha1).
I do have a bunch of other mods installed so to make sure a downloaded a fresh install of KSP and only installed different combinations of the three mods.
Turns out, I can run Parallax just fine with either GU or Kcalbeloh separately, but not together. Without Parallax they both work. 
My heavily modded version of the game also works as soon as I remove parallax or one of the two planet mods. 


Any help would be appreciated.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/b3luc1siyisq0kl/KSP.log?dl=0
